manzils.text: Kkapha. Bhebe dekho mahimanbita kura'anakhana.
Bastuta tara ascarya hacche ye tadera kache tadera'i madhye theke ekajana satarkakari esechena, ta'i abisbasira balache -- ''e to eka ajaba byapara!’’
Ki! Amara yakhana mare yaba ebam dhulo-mati haye yaba? E to bahu dura theke phire asa.’’
Amara alabat jani tadera madhyera katatuku prthibi hrasa kare phele, ara amadera kache rayeche suraksita grantha.
Bastuta tara satya pratyakhyana karechila yakhana tadera kache ta esechila, sejan'ya tara sansayakula abasthaya rayeche.
Tara ki tabe tadera uparakara akasera dike takiye dekhe na -- amara kemana ka’re ta tairi karechi e bam take susobhita karechi, ara tate kono phatala'o ne'i
ara prthibi -- take amara prasarita karechi ara tate sthapana karechi pahara-parbata, ara tate amara janmiyechi hareka rakamera manorama bastu
dekhara mato o manonibesa karara mato bisaya pratyeka anuragi bandara jan'ya.
Ara amara akasa theke barsana kari asirbadasucaka jala, tarapara tara dbara amara janma'i baganasamuha o khadyasasya ya tola haya
ara lanba lanba khejura gacha yate ache gocha gocha kamdi
dasadera jan'ya jibikasbarupa, ara era dbara amara mrta bhukhande prana sancara kari. E'ibhabe'i habe punarut'thana.
Edera age nuha-era sbajati pratyakhyana karechila, ara ras‌-era adhibasira o chamuda jati
Ara'ada o phira'a'una o luta-era bha'i-bandhura
ara a'ikara adhibasira o tubbara lokadala; -- saba'i rasulaganake pratyakhyana karechila, sutaram amara oyada satya bartechila.
Amara ki tabe klanta haye parechi prathamabarera srsti kare'i? Na, tara natuna srsti sanbandhe sandehera majhe rayeche.
Ara amara to niscaya manusa srsti karechi, ara amara jani tara antara take ki mantrana deya, ara amara kanthasirara ceye'o tara aro nikate rayechi.
Smarana rekho, du'ijana grahanakari grahana kare calechena da'ine o bamye base.
Se kono katha'i uccarana kare na yara jan'ya tara nikate'i eka tatpara prakhara prahari ne'i.
Ara mrtyukalina murcha satyi-satyi asabe, -- ''e'iti'i to ta'i ya theke tumi abyahati ca'o.’’
Ara singaya phutkara de'oya habe, ''e'iti'i se'i prati‌sruta dina.’’
Takhana pratyeka sattba cale asabe, tara sange thakabe eka calaka o eka saksi.
Tumi to abasya e sanbandhe gaphilatite chile, kinta ekhana amara tomara theke tomara abarani sariye diyechi phale tomara drsti aja tiksna hayeche.
Ara tara sangi balabe -- ''e'i to ya amara kache tairi rayeche.’’
Tomara dujane jahanname phele da'o pratyeka abisbasike, bidrohacarike
bhalo kaje nisedhakarike, simalanghanakarike, sandehakarike
ye allah‌ra sange an'ya upasya damra kariyechila, ata'eba tomara ubhaye take niksepa karo bhisana sastite.’’
Ara tara sangata balabe -- ''amadera prabhu! Ami to take bidrohi bana'i ni, kinta se nije'i chila sudura bibhrantite.’’
Tini balabena -- ''amara samane tomara tarkatarki karo na, ara ami to tomadera kache itipurbe'i amara oyada agabariyechi.
Amara kache kathara radabadala haya na, ebam ami amara bandadera prati adau an'yayacari na'i.’’
Se'idina amara jahannamake balaba -- ''tumi ki purna haye giyecha?’’ Ara se balabe -- ''aro besi ache ki?’’
Ara behesatake ana habe dharmabhirudera nikate -- adure.
E'iti'i ta yara prati‌sruti tomadera de'oya hayechila pratyeka jana barabara pratyabartanakari hephajatakarira jan'ya
ye parama karunamayake bhaya karata sangopane, ara upasthita hata binaya-namra hrdaya niye.
Ete prabesa karo prasantira sathe. E'i to cirasthayi dina.’’
Edera jan'ya thakabe tara sekhane ya ca'ibe ta'i, tara amadera kache rayeche aro besi.
Ara tadera age amara kata manabagosthike dhbansa karechi, tara edera ca'ite chila saktite besi prabala, phale tara dese- bidese abhiyana calata. Kono asrayasthala ache ki
nihsandeha ete niscaya'i upadesa rayeche tara jan'ya yara hrdaya ache, athaba ye kana deya, ara se saksya bahana kabe.
Ara amara abasya mahakasamandali o prthibi ebam e du'iyera madhye ya-kichu ache ta srsti karechi chaya dine, ara kono klanti amadera sparsa kare ni.
Ata'eba ora ya bale ta sattbe'o tumi adhyabasaya caliye ya'o ebam tomara prabhura prasansaya japatapa karo surya udayera age o asta yabara age
ara ratera belate'o tamra japatapa karo, ara e'i sijadagulora pare'o
ara sono se'idina yakhana ekajana ghosanakari ahbana karabena nikatabarti sthana theke
se'idina tara satyi-satyi mahagarjana sunate pabe. E'iti'i beriye asara dina.
Nihsandeha amara sbayam jibana dana kari ebam amara'i mrtyu ghata'i, ara amadera kache'i sesa-agamana
se'idina prthibi bidirna haye yabe tadera theke strasta-byastabhabe, e'i hacche mahasamabesa -- amadera jan'ya sahaja byapara.
Ora ya bale amara ta bhala jani, ara tumi tadera upare jabaradasti karara loka na'o. Ata'eba tumi kura'ana niye smarana kariye calo tara prati ye amara prati‌srutike bhaya kare.
Bhabo -- biksepakaridera biksepera katha
tarapara bahanakaridera bojhara katha
tarapara calamanadera sbacchandagamanera katha
tarapara bitaranakaridera kajakarmera katha
nihsandeha tomadera prati ya oyada kara hayechila ta abasya'i satya
ara nihsandeha n'yayabicara abasyambhabi.
Bhabo akasera katha -- ajasra patha bisista
tomara to niscaya'i paraspara birodhi kathaya rayecha
ye mukha phiriye thake take e theke phiriye'i rakha haya.
Kotala hoka mithyaracanakarira
yara khoda gahabare, bekheyala
tara jijnasa kare -- ''kabe asabe bicarera dina?’’
Se'i dinatate agune tadera pariksa kara habe.
Tomadera atyacara tomara asbadana kara. E'iti'i se'i yeti tomara tbaranbita karate ceyechila.’’
Nihsandeha dharmabhirura thakabe sbargo'udyanasamuhe o jharana-rajite
tadera prabhu ya tadera debena tara ta grahana karate thakabe. Tara era age niscaya'i chila satkarmasila.
Tara ratera saman'ya samaya'i ghumiye katata.
Ara nisibhore tara paritrana khumjata.
Ara tadera dhanasampadera madhye bhikharira jan'ya o bancitera jan'ya hak rekheche.
Ara prthibite nidarsanabali rayeche niscita-bisbasidera jan'ya
ara tomadera nijedera madhye. Tabu'o ki tomara ceye dekhabe na
ara akase rayeche tomadera jibika, ara ya tomadera oyada kara hayeche.
Ata'eba mahakasa o prthibira prabhura sapatha -- nihsandeha e alabat satya, yemanata tomara bastuta bakyalapa kara.
Tomara kache ibrahimera sam'manita atithidera sambada eseche ki
tara yakhana tamra darabare prabesa karala tara takhana balale -- ''salama’’. Tini'o balalena -- ''salama’’, aparicita loka.
Tini takhana tamra paribarera kache nirabe chutalena ebam ekati pusta bachura niye elena
tarapara tini eti tadera samane egiye dilena, tini balalena -- ''apanara ki khabena na?’’
Sutaram tadera samparke tini bhaya anubhaba karalena. Tara balale -- ''bhaya karo na.’’ Paksantare tara tamke susambada dila eka jnanabana chelera.
Tarapara tamra stri egiye elena bilapa karate-karate, ara tini tamra gale capara marachena ebam balachena, ''eka buri, bandhya!’’
Tara balale -- ''emanata'i habe, tomara prabhu balechena.’’ Nihsandeha tini sbayam paramajnani, sarbajnata.
Tini balalena -- ''tahale tomadera bisesa barta ki, he bartabahakagana?’’
Tara balale -- ''amadera abasya prerana kara hayeche eka aparadhi lokadera prati
yena tadera upare amara barsana karate pari matira pathara
ya amitacaridera jan'ya nirdharita rayeche tomara prabhura kache.’’
Tarapara muminadera madhyera yara sekhane rayechila tadera amara bera kare analama
kinta amara sekhane musalimadera ekati paribara byatita ara ka'uke pa'ini.
Ara amara sekhane rekhe diyechilama eka nidarsana tadera jan'ya yara marmantuda sastike bhaya kare.
Ara musara madhye'o. Dekho! Amara tamke pathiyechilama phira'a'unera kache suspasta kartrtba diye.
Kinta se phire giyechila tara saktimattara dike ebam balechila -- ''ekajana jadukara athaba ekajana pagala.’’
Takhana amara take o tara dalabalake pakara'o karalama ebam tadera niksepa karalama athai jale, ara se chila dosi.
Ara'ada jatira ksetre'o. Dekho! Amara tadera birud'dhe pathiyechilama eka bidhbansi jhara.
E yara upare ese parechila tara kono kichu'i rekhe yaya ni, etike ta kare diyechila cha'iyera mato.
Ara chamuda-jatira ksetre'o. Dekho! Tadera bala hayechila -- ''kichukala upabhoga kare na'o.’’
Tathapi tadera prabhura adesera birud'dhe tara damriyechila, phale eka bajranada tadera pakaralo, ara tara takiye rayechila.
Tadera ara damrabara ksamata ra'ila na, ara tara sahayyaprapta hate'o pare ni.
Ara purbakalina nuhera lokadalake'o. Nihsandeha tara chila satyatyagi jati.
Ara mahakasamandala -- amara ta nirmana karechi hate, ara amara'i bisalatara nirmata.
Ara prthibi -- amara eke bichiye diyechi, kaje'i kata sundara e'i bistarakari
ara pratyeka bastura madhye amara jora-jora srsti karechi, yena tomara manonibesa karo.
Ata'eba tomara bege allah‌ra dike chuto. Ami niscaya'i tomadera nikata tamra kacha theke ekajana suspasta satarkakari.
Ara allah‌ra sathe an'ya kono upasya damra karo na. Nihsandeha ami tomadera nikata tamra kacha theke eka jana suspasta satarkakari.’’
E'ibhabe'i. Edera age yara chila tadera kache emana kono rasula asena ni yamke tara na balechila -- ''ekajana jadukara, na haya ekajana pagala.’’
Era ki etike'i maurusi bisaya baniyeche? Na, tara hacche simalanghanakari jati.
Ata'eba tadera theke tumi mukha phiriye na'o, kenana tumi to dosi na'o.
Tabu'o tumi upadesa dite thako, kenana nihsandeha upadesadana muminadera upakara karabe.
Ara ami jina o manusake, tara amake upasana karuka -- e'ijan'ya chara srsti kari ni.
Ami tadera theke kono jibika ca'i na, ara ami ca'i na ye tara amake kha'oyabe.
Baranca allaha -- tini'i birata riyekadata, ksamatara adhikari, saktimana.
Sutaram yara an'yayacarana kareche tadera jan'ya abasya'i rayeche eka jhuri tadera sangopangadera jhurira n'yaya, sejan'ya tara yena amara kache tarighari na kare.
Ata'eba dhik tadera jan'ya yara abisbasa posana kare -- tadera se'i dinatira karane yeti tadera oyada kara hayeche
bhabo paharera katha
ara likhita granthera
eka kholamela pataya
ara bhabo ghanaghana gamanagamanera grhera katha
ara samunnata chadera
ara ucchalita samudrera katha
nihsandeha tomara prabhura sasti abasyabi
etira jan'ya kono pratirodhakari ne'i
Yedina akasa alorana karabe alorane
ara paharagulo cale yabe cale ya'oyaya.
Ata'eba dhik se'idina pratyakhyanakaridera jan'ya
yara brtha tarkabitarke khela khelache.
Se'idina tadera dhakka diye ne'oya habe jahannamera agunera dike dhakka dite dite.
E'iti'i se'i aguna yetike tomara mithya balate.
Eti ki tabe jadu? Na ki tomara dekhate paccha na
dhuke para ete! Atahpara tomara dhairya dhara athaba dhairya na-dhara, tomadera jan'ya ekasamana. Tomadera pratiphala de'oya hacche sudhumatra tomara ya karate tara'i.’’
Nihsandeha muttakira thakabe jannate o paramanande
tadera prabhu ya tadera diyechena sejan'ya tara sukhabhoga karate thakabe, ara tadera prabhu tadera raksa karabena bhayankara agunera sasti theke.
Tomara ya kare thakate sejan'ya trptira sathe kha'oda'o o pana karo.’’
Tara helana diye basabe sari-sari sinhasanera upare, ara amara tadera jora miliye deba ayatalocana huradera sathe.

Ara yara imana ane, ebam yadera santanasantati dharmabisbase tadera anusarana kare -- amara tadera sange milana ghataba tadera chelemeyedera, ara amara tadera kriyakarma theke kono kichu'i tadera jan'ya kamiye deba na. Pratyeka byakti'i se ya arjana kareche sejan'ya dayi.
Ara amara tadera pracura parimane pradana karaba phalaphasala o machamansa -- ya tara pachanda kare ta theke.
Tara sekhane ekati panapatra parasparera madhye adana-pradana karabe, tate thakabe na kono khelo acarana, na kono papa.
Ara tadera caridike ghurabe tadera kisorara, -- tara yena suraksita mukto
ara tadera ke'u-ke'u aparera dike jijnasabada ka’re egiye yabe
tara balabe -- ''nihsandeha amara itipurbe amadera parijanadera samparke bhita chilama.
Tabe allaha amadera prati anugraha karechena, ara amadera raksa karechena tapapirita bayuprabahera sasti theke.
Amara abasya era age'o tamke dakate thakatama. Nihsandeha tini khoda ati sadasaya, aphuranta phaladata.
Ata'eba tumi upadesa dana karate thako, kenana tomara prabhura anugrahe tumi to ganatkara na'o ebam matha-pagala'o na'o.
Athaba tara ki bale -- ''ekajana kabi, amara baram tara jan'ya apeksa kari kalera kabale parara daruna
tumi balo -- ''tomara apeksa karate thako, ami'o tabe abasya tomadera sange apeksakaridera madhye rayechi.’’
Athaba tadera bodhasakti ki e-bisaye tadera nirdesa diye thake? Athaba tara ki eka simalanghanakari jati
athaba tara ki bale ye eti se barnana kareche? Na, tara bisbasa kare na.
Tahale tara era samatulya eka racana niye asuka, -- yadi tara satyabadi haya.
Athaba tadera ki srsti kara hayeche ke'u na-thaka theke, na tara'i srstikarta
athaba tara ki srsti karechila mahakasamandala o prthibi? Na, tara drrhabisbasa rakhe na.
Athaba tadera kache'i ki rayeche tomara prabhura dhanabhandara, na tara'i niyanta
athaba tadera kache ki rayeche siri yamra sahayye tara sone neya? Tahale tadera srabanakari niye asuka eka suspasta pramana.
Athaba tamra karane ki rayeche kan'yarasaba, ara tomadera jan'ya rayeche putrara
athaba tumi ki tadera kache parisramika ca'icha, yara phale tara denaya bharakranta haye geche
athaba adrsya ki tadera kache rayeche yara phale tara likhe phelate pare
athaba tara ki sarayantra karate caya? Kinta yara abisbasa posana kare tara nijera'i sarayantre jariye parabe.
Athaba allah chara tadera ki an'ya upasya rayeche? Allah‌ra'i saba mahima -- tara ya sarika kare tini tara ba'ire.
Ara yadi tara dekhe akasera eka tukaro bhenge parache, tahale tara balabe -- ''eka punjibhuta meghamala.’’
Ata'eba tadera chere da'o ye paryanta na tara tadera se'i dinatira saksat paya yakhana tara hatabhanba haye yabe
se'idina tadera cala-cakranta tadera kono kaje asabe na, ara tadera sahayya'o kara habe na.
Ara yara an'yayacara kareche tadera jan'ya e chara aro sasti rayeche, kinta tadera adhikansa'i jane na.
Ata'eba tomara prabhura bicarera jan'ya dhairya dhare theko, bastuta tumi niscaya'i amadera cokhera samane rayecha. Kaje'i tomara prabhura prasansaya japatapa karo yakhana tumi uthe damra'o
ara ratera belaya'o tabe tamra japatapa karo ebam taragulo jhimiye yabara samaye'o.
Bhabo tarakara katha, yakhana ta asta yaya
tomadera sangi dosa-truti karena na, ara tini bipathe'o yana na
ara tini icchamata kono katha balena na.
E'ikhana pratyadista ha'oya pratyadesabani bai to naya
tamke sikhiyechena birata saktimana
balabiryera adhikari. Kaje'i tini paripurnataya paumchalena.
Ara tini rayechena urdhba digante.
Tarapara tini sannikate elena, atahpara tini abanata karalena
takhana tini du'i dhanukera byabadhane ra'ilena, athaba ara'o kache.
Takhana tini tamra bandara kache pratyadesa karalena ya tini pratyadesa karena.
Hrdaya asbikara kare ni ya tini dekhechilena tate.
Tomara ki tabe tamra sange bitarka karabe ya tini dekhechena se-sanbandhe
ara tini niscaya'i tamke dekhechilena an'ya eka abatarane
duradigantera sidarah‌-gachera kache
tara kache ache cira-upabhogya udyana.
Dekho! Ya acchadana kare ta dheke diyechila sidarah‌-gachake
drsti bibhranta haya ni ebam ta sima chariye'o yaya ni.
Tini niscaya'i tamra prabhura srestha nidarsanagulora madhye ceye dekhechilena.
Tomara ki tabe bhebe dekhecha lata o'uyaya
ebam manata, -- trtiya arekati
tomadera jan'ya putrasantana ara tamra jan'ya kan'ya
e to bara'i asangata bantana

Tara namabali bai to naya, ya tomara namakarana karecha -- tomara o tomadera purbapurusara, yadera jan'ya allah kono sanada pathana ni. Tara to sudhu anumanera ebam ya tadera antara kamana kare tara'i anusarana kare. Athaca tadera prabhura kacha theke tadera kache pathanirdesa abasya'i ese geche.
Athaba manusera jan'ya ki ta'i thakabe ya se kamana kare
kinta sesata to allah‌ra, ara prathamata'o.
Ara mahakasamandale kata ye phiris‌ta rayeche yadera suparisa kono kaje asabe na yataksana na allah anumati dena tara jan'ya yake tini iccha karena o tini santasta hayechena.
Nihsandeha yara parakale bisbasa kare na tara phiris‌tadera nama deya meyedera name.
Ara e bisaye tadera kono jnana ne'i. Tara to anumanera'i anusarana karache, ara nihsandeha satyera birud'dhe anumane kono labha haya na.
Sejan'ya take upeksa karo ye amadera upadesa theke phire yaya ara duniyara jibana chara ara kichu caya na.
E'iti'i tadera jnanera sesasima. Nihsandeha tomara prabhu -- tini'i bhala janena take ye tara patha theke bhrasta hayeche, ara tini'i bhala janena ye satpathaprapta.

Ara mahakasamandale ya-kichu ache ebam ya-kichu ache prthibite ta allah‌ra'i, yena yara manda kaja kareche tadera tini pratiphala dite parena ya tara kareche sejan'ya, ara yara satkaja kareche tadera tini bhalabhabe pratidana dite parena.

Yara barjana kare bara bara papacara o aslila kaja -- mukhomukhi ha'oya bhinna -- tomara prabhu paritrane niscaya'i aparisima. Tini tomadera bhalo janena yakhana theke tini tomadera srstira sucana karechena mati theke, ara yakhana tomara chile tomadera mayera pete bhranarupe. Ata'eba tomara tomadera nijedera gunagana karo na. Tini'i bhalo janena take ye dharmabhiruta abalanbana kare.
Tumi ki tabe take dekhecha ye phire yaya
Ara yatsaman'ya dana kare ebam nirdayata dekhaya
tara kache ki adrsya samparke jnana rayeche phale se dekhata pacche
athaba take ki sambada de'oya haya ni musara granthe ya ache se-sanbandhe
ebam ibrahima sanbandhe yini sampurnarupe pratipalana karechilena
yatha kono bharabahi an'yera bojha bahana karabe na
ara e'i ye manusera jan'ya kichu'i thakabe na yara jan'ya se cesta na ka’re
ara e'i ye, tara pracesta acire'i drstigocara habe
tarapara take pratidana de'oya habe paripurna pratidane
ara e'i ye, tomara prabhura dike'i hacche sesa-sima
ara e'i ye, tini'i hasana ara tini'i kamdana
ara e'i ye, tini'i marena o tini'i bamcana.
Ara e'i ye, tini'i srsti karechena joraya-joraya nara o nari
sukrakita theke yakhana take bin'yasa kara haya
ara e'i ye, tamra upare'i rayeche punaraya ut'thanera dayitba
ara e'i ye, tini'i dhanadaulata dena o sukha-samrd'dhi pradana karena
ara e'i ye, tini'i si'ra naksatrera prabhu
ara e'i ye, tini'i dhbansa karechilena pracinakalera'ada-jatike
ara chamuda-jati'o, ta'i tini baki rakhena ni
ara nuha-era lokadala'o era age. Nihsandeha tara chila -- tara'i to chila atyanta atyacari o bejaya abadhya.
Ara ulate phela saharagulo -- tini dhbansa karechilena
phale tadera tini dheke diyechilena ya dheke deya.
Ata'eba tomara prabhura kona anugraha samparke tumi badanubada karabe
pracinakalera satarkakaridera madhye theke ini hacchena ekajana satarkakari.
Asanna ghatana samagata
eti dura karabara mato allah chara ara ke'u ne'i.
E'i bibrtite tomara ki tajjaba haccha
ara tomara ki hasacha, tomara ki ara kamdabe na
ara tomara to helaphela karacha.
Ata'eba allah‌ra prati sijada karo ebam upasana karo.
Gharighanta samagata, ara candra dbikhandita hayeche.
Ara yadi tara kono nidarsana dekhe, tara phire yaya o bale -- ''eka jabaradasta jadu.’’
Ara tara pratyakhyana kare ebam tara tadera kheyalakhusira anusarana kare, athaca pratyeka bisayera'i nispatti haye'i geche.
Ara tadera kache abasya kichuta sambada ese'i geche yate rayeche pratisedhaka
eka suparinata jnana, kintu e satarkikarana kono kaje ase na.
Kaje'i tadera theke phire esa. Ekadina ahbanakari ahbana karabena eka apritikara byaparera prati
tadera cokha abanata abasthaya, tara beriye asate thakabe kabara theke yena tara chariye para pangapala
ora ahabayakera prati chute asabe. Abisbasira balabe -- ''e'iti bara kathina dina!’’
Edera age nuha-era lokadala satyapratyakhyana karechila, phale tara amadera bandake pratyakhyana karala o balale -- ''eka ti pagala’’! Ara tamke abajna kara hayechila.
Sejan'ya tini tamra prabhuke deke balalena -- ''ami to parabhuta haye parechi, ata'eba tumi sahayya karo.’’
Takhana amara asamanera darajagulo khule dilama barsanasila panira dbara
ara jaminake utksepa karate dilama jharanadharaya, phale pani milita haye gela eka purbanirdharita byapare
ara amara tamke bahana karalama tate ya chila takta o pereka sanbalita
ta bhese calechila amadera cokhera samane, -- eka pratidana tamra jan'ya yamke pratyakhyana kara hayechila.
Ara amara abasya etike rekhe diyechi eka nidarsanarupe. Kintu ke'u ki rayeche upadesapraptadera antarbhukta
sutaram kemana hayechila amara sasti o amara satarkikarana
ara amara to abasya'i kura'anake upadesagrahanera jan'ya sahajabodhya kare diyechi, kintu ke'u ki ache ye upadesapraptadera madhyekara
ara'ada-jati satyapratyakhyana karechila, kaje'i kemana hayechila amara sasti o amara satarkikarana
Nihsandeha amara tadera upare eka carama durbhagyera dine pathiyechilama eka pracanda jhara-tophana
ya manusake uriye niyechila, yena tara chila utpatita khejuragachera gumri.
Sutaram kemana hayechila amara sasti o amara satarkikarana
kaje'i amara alabat kura'anake upadesa grahanera jan'ya sahajabodhya kare diyechi, kintu ke'u ki habe upadesapraptadera antarbhukta
chamuda-jati'o satarkikarana pratyakhyana karechila.
Kaje'i tara balechila -- ''ki! Amadera madhyekara manusa'i ekajana, take'i ki amara anusarana karaba? Seksetre amara to niscaya'i bipathagami haba o pagalamite paraba.
Amadera madhye theke smaraka ki tara upare'i patita hala? Bastuta se ekajana d'aha mithyabadi, dambhika.’’
Kalake'i tara tbaraya janate parabe ke mithyuka, ke dambhika.
Nihsandeha amara ekati ustrike pathate yacchi tadera jan'ya pariksasbarupa, sejan'ya tadera prati laksya rakho ebam dhairyadharana karo.
Ara tadera janiye da'o ye panira ksetre tadera madhye bhagabhagi rayeche, pratyeka jalapane hajira thakabe.
Kintu tara tadera senatke daka dila, takhana se dharala o kete phelala.
Pariname kemana hayechila amara sasti o amara satarkikarana
amara abasya'i tadera upare pathiyechilama ekatimatra mahagarjana, phale tara haye gela khomyara-prastutakarira sukano-bhanga dalapalara n'yaya.
Ara amara niscaya'i kura'anake upadesa-grahanera jan'ya sahajabodhya kare diyechi, kintu ke'u ki rayeche upadesapraptadera an'yatama
luta-era lokadala'o satarkikarana pratyakhyana karechila.
Nihsandeha amara tadera upare pathiyechilama eka pathara barsanakari jhara, -- luta-era parijanadera byatita, amara tadera ud'dhara karechilama sesarate
amadera tarapha theke eka anugraha. E'ibhabe'i amara puraskara di'i ye krtajnata dekhaya take.
Ara tini to itipurbe'i tadera satarka kare diyechilena amadera bhisanabhabe pakarano samparke, kintu tara amara satarkikarana sanbandhe katha-katakati karachila.
Ara tara abasya tamra kacha theke tamra atithidera ceyechila, takhana amara tadera cokhaguloke sesa kare diyechilama, ''ata'eba amara sasti asbadana kara amara satarkikaranera pare.’’
Ara abasya nirdharita sasti bhorabelate tadera upare parechila.
Amara sasti ekhana asbadana kara amara satarkikaranera pare?’’
Ara amara to niscaya'i kura'anake upadesa grahanera jan'ya sahajabodhya kare diye'ichi, kintu ke ache ye upadesapraptadera madhyekara
ara abasya phira'a'unera lokadera kache satarkikarana esechila.
Tara amadera nidarsanasamuha -- tadera sabaka’ti, pratyakhyana karechila, sejan'ya amara tadera pakara'o karechilama mahasaktisali paramaksamatabanera pakaranora dbara.
Tomadera abisbasira ki edera ca'ite bhala, na tomadera jan'ya abyahati rayeche dharmagranthera madhye
athaba tara ki bale -- ''amara parasparera sahayyakari asta ekata dala’’
sighra'i e lokadala bidhabasta habe ebam prspradarsana kare phire yabe.
Bastuta gharighanta'i tadera nirdharita sthanakala, ara se'i gharighanta habe ati kathora o bara tikta.
Nihsandeha aparadhira bibhranta o bikaragrasta habe.
Se'i dina tadera mukha hecamre tadera tene niye ya'oya habe agunera madhye -- ''jbalamaya agunera sparsa asbadana karo!’’
Nihsandeha pratyekati jinisa -- amara eti srsti karechi parimapa anusare.
Ara amadera adesa ekabara bai to naya, cokhera palakera n'yaya.
Ara amara to tomadera senatdera dhbansa kare diyechilama, kintu ke'u ki rayeche upadesapraptadera madhyekara
ara tara ya kareche tara saba-kichu'i nathipatre rayeche.
Ara chota o bara pratyekati bisaya lipibad'dha ache.
Dharmabhirura abasya'i thakabe jharanabestita jannate
satyera asane sarbasaktimana rajadhirajera samakse
ara-rahamana
tini kura'ana siksa diyechena.
Tini'i srsti karechena manusake
tini take sikhiyechena suspasta bhasa.
Surya o candra hiseba mato caleche.
Ara trnalata o gachapala anugatya karache.
Ara akasake, -- tini take samucca karechena, ara tini sthapana karechena damripalla.
Yena tomara mapakathite ullanghana na karo.
Ara ojana sathikabhabe kayema karo, ara mapajokhe kamati karo na.
Ara prthibi, -- tini etike prasarita karechena jibajantura jan'ye
tate rayeche phalaphasala o gochabisista khejura gacha
ara ache khosa o sugandhi dana-thaka sasya.
Ata'eba tomadera ubhayera prabhura kon anugraha tomara ubhaye asbikara karabe
tini manusake srsti karechena khanakhane mati diye matira basanera mato
ara tini jinake srsti karechena agunera sikha diye.
Sutaram tomadera prabhura kon anugraha tomara ubhaye asbikara karabe
tini du'i purbera prabhu, ara du'i pascimera'o prabhu.
Sutaram tomadera prabhura kon anugraha tomara ubhaye asbikara karabe
tini prabahita karechena du'i jalarasike
tadera ubhayera madhye rayeche eka byabadhana ya tara atikrama karate pare na.
Sutaram tomadera prabhura kon anugraha tomara ubhaye asbikara karabe
tadera du'iyera madhye theke beriye ase mukto o prabala.
Ata'eba tomadera prabhura kon anugraha tomara ubhaye asbikara karabe
ara tamra'i hacche samudre bhasamana parbatatulya jahajagulo.
Sutaram tomadera prabhura kon anugraha tomara ubhaye asbikara karabe
era upare yara'i ache ta binasasila
tabe baki thakabe tomara prabhura cehara -- parama mahima o mahanubhabatara adhikari.
Sutaram tomadera prabhura kon anugraha tomara ubhaye asbikara karabe
Mahakasamandale o prthibite yara rayeche tara tamra'i kache prarthana janaya. Prati niyata tini maryadaya birajamana.
Sutaram tomadera prabhura kon anugraha tomara ubhaye asbikara karabe
abilanbe amara tomadera bisaye hiseba-nikesa neba, he du'i brhatsaktibarga
sutaram tomadera prabhura kon anugraha tomara ubhaye asbikara karabe
he jina o manusera samabetagosthi! Yadi tomara mahakasa-mandala o prthibira simarekha theke beriye yabara ksamata rakha tahale beriye ya'o. Tomara atikrama karate parabe na nirdesa byatita.
Ata'eba tomadera prabhura kon anugraha tomara ubhaye asbikara karabe
tomadera ubhayera jan'ya pathano habe agunera sikha o tamara sphulinga, takhana tomara sahayya pete parabe na.
Ta'i tomadera prabhura kon anugraha tomara ubhaye asbikara karabe
ara yakhana akasa bidirna habe ebam haye yabe rankara camarara mato lala
sutaram tomadera prabhura kon anugraha tomara ubhaye asbikara karabe
ata'eba sedina kono manusake'i prasna kara habe na tara aparadha sanbandhe, na kono jinake.
Sutaram tomadera prabhura kon anugraha tomara ubhaye asbikara karabe
aparadhidera cena yabe tadera ceharara dbara, kaje'i tadera pakarano habe culera jhumtite o thengaguloya.
Ata'eba tomadera prabhura kon anugraha tomara ubhaye asbikara karabe
e'iti'i jahannama yetike aparadhira mithya balata.
Tara chutachuti karabe era o phutanta panira caridike.
Ta'i tomadera prabhura kon anugraha tomara ubhaye asbikara karabe
ara ye tara prabhura samane damrabara bhaya rakhe tara jan'ya rayeche duti sbargo'udyana
ata'eba tomadera prabhura kon anugraha tomara ubhaye asbikara karabe
duto'i ghana dalapalabisista.
Sutaram tomadera prabhura kon anugraha tomara ubhaye asbikara karabe
Tadera madhye baye caleche duti nadi.
Sutaram tomadera prabhura kon anugraha tomara ubhaye asbikara karabe
e dutoya rayeche pratyeka phalamulera jora jora.
Ata'eba tomadera prabhura kon anugraha tomara ubhaye asbikara karabe
tara helana diye basabe galicara upare yara astara karukaryamaya resamera. Ara ubhaya jannatera phala jhulate thakabe.
Sutaram tomadera prabhura kon anugraha tomara ubhaye asbikara karabe
tadera madhye rayeche salaja-namra ayatalocana, -- edera age kono manusa tadera sparsa kare ni, ara jina'o naya.
Sutaram tomadera prabhura kon anugraha tomara ubhaye asbikara karabe
tara yena cuni o prabala.
Ata'eba tomadera prabhura kon anugraha tomara ubhaye asbikara karabe
bhalora puraskara ki bhala chara an'ya kichu habe
sutaram tomadera prabhura kon anugraha tomara ubhaye asbikara karabe
ara e'i duti byatita duti jannata rayeche.
Sutaram tomadera prabhura kon anugraha tomara ubhaye asbikara karabe
duto'i garha-sabuja.
Phale tomadera prabhura kon anugraha tomara ubhaye asbikara karabe
ubhayera madhye rayeche du'i ucchalita prasrabana.
Ata'eba tomadera prabhura kon anugraha tomara ubhaye asbikara karabe
ubhayera madhye rayeche phalamula o khejura o dalima.
Phale tomadera prabhura kon anugraha tomara ubhaye asbikara karabe
se dutote rayeche susila sundarira
sutaram tomadera prabhura kon anugraha tomara ubhaye asbikara karabe
huragana, -- tambura bhetare antahpurabasini.
Sutaram tomadera prabhura kon anugraha tomara ubhaye asbikara karabe
edera age kono manusa tadera sparsa kare ni, ara jina'o naya.
Ata'eba tomadera prabhura kon anugraha tomara ubhaye asbikara karabe
tara helana diye base thakabe sabuja takiyate o manorama galicara upare.
Sutaram tomadera prabhura kon anugraha tomara ubhaye asbikara karabe
kata kalyanamaya tomara prabhura nama, tini apara mahimara o bipula karunara adhikari.
Yakhana birata ghatanati ghatabe
era sanghatanake mithya balara ke'u thakabe na.
Eti lanchita karabe, eti karabe samunnata.
Yakhana prthibi alorita habe alorane
ara paharagulo bhenge parabe curna-bicurna haye
phale ta haye yabe biksipta dhulikana
ara tomara haye parabe tinati srenite
yatha dana dikera dala, -- kemanatara e'i danadikera dala
ara bamdikera dala, -- kemanatara e'i bamdikera dala
ara agragamigana to agragami
era'i habe naikatyaprapta
anandamaya udyane.
Prathamakalinadera theke adhika sankhyaya
ara parabartikalinadera theke alpa sankhyaya.
Karukaryamaya sinhasane
tate tara helana diye asana grahana karabe paraspara mukhomukhi haye.
Tadera caridike ghure berabe ciranabina tarunera
panapatra o sora'i niye o nirmala paniyera peyala.
Tadera matha dharabe na tate, ara tadera nesa'o dharabe na.
Ara phala-mula ya tara pachanda kare
ara pakhira mansa ya tara kamana kare
ara ayatalocana huragana
abrta muktara udaharanera n'yaya
ya tara karato tara puraskara.
Tara sekhane sunabe na kono khelokatha, na kono papabakya
sudhu e'i katha chara -- ''salama! Salama!’’
Ara danadikera dala, -- kemanatara e'i danadikera dala
kamta bihina sidaraha-gachera nice
ara sari sari sajano kalagacha
ara sudurabistrta chaya
ara uchale otha pani
ara pracura parimane phalamula
byahata habara naya ebam nisid'dha habara'o naya.
Ara umcudarera galica.
Nihsandeha amara odera srsti karechi bisesa srstite
ara tadera baniyechi cirakumari
sohagini, samabayaska
daksinapanthi lokadera jan'ya.
Prathamakalinadera theke adhika sankhyaya
ara parabartikalinadera madhye theke'o adhika sankhyaya.
Kintu bamapanthidala -- kemanatara e'i bamapanthi dala.
Uttapta batase o phutanta panite
ara kalo dhomyara chayaya
sitala naya ebam sam'manajanaka'o naya.
Athaca tara to era age chila bhogabilase magna
ara tara ghoratara papacare jeda dhare thakata
ara tara balata -- ''ki! Amara yakhana mare yaba o mati o haddi haye yaba takhana ki amara adau punarut'thita haba
ebam amadera purbabarti pitrpurusara'o
tumi balo -- ''nihsandeha purbabartira ebam parabartira
abasya'i saba'ike ekatrita kara habe eka subidita dinera nirdharita sthane-ksane
takhana nihsandeha tomara'i, he pathabhrasta mithya'aropakarigana
tomara alabat ahara karabe yikkumera gachera theke
ebam ta'i diye tomara udara purna karabe
tarapara tomara tara upare pana karabe uttapta pani
ara tomara pana karabe trsnarta utera pana karara n'yaya.’’
E'i habe tadera apyayana bicarera dine.
Amara'i to tomadera srsti karechi, tabe kena tomara satya bale sbikara kara na
tomara ki tabe bhebe dekhecha -- ya tomara skhalana kara
tomara bujhi oke srsti karecha, na amara srstikarta
amara'i tomadera madhye mrtyu dharya kare rekhechi, ara amara pratihata haba na
yena amara badale dite pari tomadera anukarane, ebam tomadera rupantarita karate pari tate ya tomara jana na.
Ara tomara abasya prathama abhyut'thana sanbandhe abagata hayecha, tabe kena tomara bhebe dekha na
tomara ki bhebe dekhecha ya tomara bapana kara
tomara ki ta gajiye tulo, na amara bardhanakari
amara yadi ca'itama tabe amara alabat take khara-kutoya parinata karate paratama, takhana tomara hahutasa karate thakabe
amara to niscaya rnagrasta halama
baram amara bancita halama.’’
Tomara ye pani pana kara se-sanbandhe tomara ki bhebe dekhecha
tomara'i ki ta megha theke namiye ana, na amara barsanakari
Amara yadi ca'itama tahale amara take lona kare dite paratama, kena tabe tomara krtajnata prakasa kara na
tomara ye aguna jbala'o ta ki tomara laksya karecha
tomara'i ki tara gachake janma'iyecha, na amara utpadanakari
amara'i take baniyechi eka nidarsanasamagri ebam marucaridera jan'ya eka prayojanasamagri.
Ata'eba tomara sarbasaktimana prabhura namera japatapa karo.
Na, ami kintu sapatha karachi naksatrarajira abasthanera
ara nihsandeha eti to eka birata sapatha, yadi tomara janate
nihsandeha eti to eka sam'manita kura'ana
eka suraksita granthe.
Ke'u ta sparsa karabe na puta-pabitra chara.
Eti eka abatarana bisbajagatera prabhura kacha theke.
Ta sattbe'o ki se'i banira prati tomara tucchatacchilya bhabapanna
ebam tomadera jibika baniye niyecha ye tomara mithya akhya debe
tabe kena yakhana kanthagata haye yaya
ebam tomara ye-samaye takiye thako
amara takhana tomadera ca'ite tara besi nikatabarti kintu tomara dekhate pa'o na.
Yadi tomara ajnadhina na haye thaka tabe kena tomara para na
take phiriye dite, yadi tomara satyabadi ha'o
ara paksantare yadi se naikatyapraptadera antarbhukta haya.
Tahale ayesa-arama o saurabha, ebam anandamaya udyana.
Ara aparapakse se yadi daksinapanthidera madhyekara haya
tahale daksinapanthidera dalera theke -- ''tomara prati salama.’’
Ara paksantare se yadi pratyakhyanakari pathabhrastadera antarbhukta haye thake
tahale apyayana habe phutanta pani diye
ebam prabesasthala habe bhayankara aguna
nihsandeha eti abasya suniscita satya.
Sutaram tomara sarbasaktimana prabhura namera japatapa karo.
Mahakasamandale o prthibite ya-kichu ache ta allah‌ra japatapa kare, ara tini mahasaktisali, paramajnani.
Tamra'i hacche mahakasamandala o prthibira sarbabhaumatba tini jibana dana karena o mrtyu ghatana, ara tini'i saba-kichura upare sarbasaktimana.
Tini'i adi o anta ara prakasya o gupta, kenana tini'i saba-kichu sanbandhe sarbajnata.

Tini'i se'ijana yini mahakasamandala o prthibi srsti karechena chaya dine, tarapara tini samarohana karalena arasera upare. Tini janena ya prthibira bhetare prabesa kare ebam ya ta theke beriye ase, ara ya akasa theke neme ase ebam ya tate uthe yaya. Ara tini tomadera sange rayechena yekhane'i tomara thaka na kena. Ara tomara ya kara se-sanbandhe allah samyaka drasta.
Tamra'i hacche mahakasamandala o prthibira sarbabhaumatba ara allah‌ra'i prati byapara-syaparagulo phiriye ne'oya haya.
Tini ratake dinera madhye prabesa kariye dena ebam dinake prabesa karana ratera madhye. Ara bukera bhetare ya-kichu ache se- sanbandhe tini sarbajnata.

Allah‌ra o tamra rasulera prati imana ano, ebam kharaca karo ta theke ya diye tini ete tomadera uttaradhikari baniyechena. Sutaram tomadera madhyera yara imana ane o kharaca kare, tadera jan'ya rayeche eka birata pratidana.

Ara tomadera ki hayeche ye tomara allah‌te bisbasa karacha na, athaca rasula tomadera ahbana karachena yena tomara tomadera prabhura prati bisbasa sthapana karo, ebam tini'o itipurbe'i tomadera theke angikara grahana karechena, -- yadi tomara bisbasi haye thako

tini'i se'ijana yini tamra bandara kache suspasta nirdesabali abatarana karachena yena tini tomadera bera kabe anate parena andhakara theke alokera madhye. Ara allah niscaya'i tomadera prati to parama snehamaya, aphuranta phaladata.

Ara tomadera ki hayeche ye tomara allah‌ra pathe kharaca kara na, athaca allah‌ra'i hacche mahakasamandala o prthibira uttaradhikara? Tomadera madhye tara samatulya naya yara se'i bijayera purbe kharaca karechila o yud'dha karechila. Era srenibibhage uccatara tadera theke yara parabartikale kharaca kare o yud'dha kare, ara pratyekake'i allah oyada karechena kalyanera. Kenana tomara ya kara se-sanbandhe allah purna oyakiphahala.
Ke se'ijana ye allah‌ke karja deya uttama karja, phale tini etike tarajan'ya bahugunita kare dena, ara tara jan'ya rayeche sam'manita puraskara

se'idina tumi bisbasidera o bisbasinidera dekhate pabe -- tadera aloka dhabita hayeche tadera sam'mukhe o tadera danadika diye, -- ''tomadera jan'ya aja susambada -- sbargo'udyanasamuhe yadera nice diye baye caleche jharanaraji, sekhane abasthana karabe.’’ Eti'i hacche birata saphalya.

Se'i dina yakhana kapatacari o kapatacarinira balabe tadera yara bisbasa kareche -- ''amadera dike dekho to, tomadera aloka theke yena amara nite pari.’’ Bala habe -- ''tomara tomadera pechane phire ya'o ebam alora khomja kara.’’ Tarapara tadera madhye ekati de'oyala damra karano habe yate thakabe ekati daraja. Tara bhetarera dike, sekhane rayeche karuna, ara tara ba'irera dike, tara samane'i rayeche sasti.

Tara tadera deke balabe -- ''amara ki tomadera sange chilama na?’’ Tara balabe -- ''ham, kinta tomara tomadera nijedera pralubdha karechile, ara pratiksa karechile, ara brtha kamana tomadera pratarita karechila ye paryanta na allah‌ra bidhana esechila, ara allah samparke mahaprataraka tomadera pratarana karechila.

Sejan'ya ajakera dine tomadera theke kono muktipana grahana kara habe na, ara yara abisbasa karechila tadera theke'o naya. Tomadera abasasthala hacche jahannama, e'i-i tomadera murabbi, ara kata nikrsta gantabyasthala!’’

Ekhana'o ki samaya haya ni tadera jan'ya ye yara bisbasa kare tadera hrdaya binata habe allah‌ra smarane ebam satyera ya abatirna hayeche? Ara tara odera mato na hoka yadera purbabartikale grantha de'oya hayechila, kinta samaya tadera jan'ya sudirgha mane hayechila, phale tadera hrdaya kathina haye parechila. Ara tadera madhyera aneke'i hayechila satyatyagi.
Tomara jene rakho ye allah prthibitake tara mrtyura pare prana sancara karena. Amara to tomadera jan'ya nirdesabali suspasta kare diyechi yena tomara bujhate para.
Nihsandeha danasila purusa o danasila narira ara yara allah‌ke uttama rna dana kare -- tadera jan'ya ta bahugunita kara habe, ara tadera jan'ya rayeche sam'manita puraskara.

Ara yara allah‌ra prati o tamra rasulera prati imana eneche, tara'i khoda satyaparayana ebam tadera prabhura samakse saksyadata. Tadera jan'ya rayeche tadera pratidana o tadera aloka. Paksantare yara abisbasa kare o amadera nirdesabali pratyakhyana kare, tara'i hacche bhayankara agunera basinda.

Tomara jene rakho ye parthiba jibanata to khela-dhulo o amoda-pramoda o jamkajamaka o tomadera nijedera madhye hamabara'i ebam dhanadaulata o santanasantatira pratiyogita matra. Eti brstira upamara mato yara utpadana casidera camatkrta kare, tarapara ta sukiye yaya, tumi takhana ta dekhate pa'o halade haye geche, abasese ta kharakuto haye yaya! Ara parakale rayeche kathora sasti, paksantare rayeche allah‌ra kacha theke paritrana o santasti. Ara parthiba jibana chalanamaya bhogabilasa bai to naya.

Tomara pratiyogita karo tomadera prabhura kacha theke paritrana labhera jan'ya ebam emana eka jannatera jan'ya yara bistara hacche mahakasa o prthibira bistrtira mato, -- eti tairi kara hayeche tadera jan'ya yara allah‌te o tamra rasulera prati imana ane. E hacche allah‌ra anugraha pracurya, tini ta pradana karena yake tini iccha karena. Bastuta allah birata karunabhandarera adhikari.
Emana kono biparyaya prthibite patita haya na ara tomadera nijedera upare'o naya ya amara ghatabara age ekati kitabe na rayeche. Nihsandeha eti allah‌ra jan'ye sahaja.
Ejan'ya ye tomara yena duhkha karo na ya tomadera theke hariye yaya, ebam tomara yena ullasa na karo ya tini tomadera pradana karena sejan'ya. Ara allah bhalabasena na samudaya abibecaka ahankarike
yara karpanya kare, ara lokedera'o karpanyera nirdesa deya. Ara ye ke'u phire yaya, tabe niscaya allaha, tini'i dhanabana, prasansar'ha.

Amara to amadera rasulaganake pathiye diyechilama suspasta pramanadi diye, ara tamdera sange amara abatarana karechilama dharmagrantha o manadanda yate lokera n'yayabicara pratistha karate pare, ara amara loha pathiyechi yate rayeche birata saktimatta o manusera jan'ya upakarita, ara yena allah janate parena ke tamke o tamra rasulaganake agocare'o sahayya kare. Nihsandeha allah mahabaliyana, mahasaktisali.

Ara amara itipurbe nuh‌ke o ibrahimake pathiyechilama, ara tamdera bansadharadera madhye nabu'ot o grantha sansthapana karechilama, kaje'i tadera ke'u-ke'u chila satpathaprapta, kinta tadera adhikansa'i chila satyatyagi.

Tarapara amadera rasulaganake tamdera padacihne calate diyechilama, ara mariyama-putra isake amara anusarana kariyechilama o tamke amara inajila diyechilama, ara yara tamra anusarana karechila tadera antare amara sadayata o karuna diyechilama. Kinta sann'yasabada -- tara'i eti abiskara karechila, amara tadera prati eti lipibad'dha kari ni, sudhu allah‌ra santastira anusandhana kara, kinta tara eti palana kare ni yemanata eti palanera yogya chila. Phale tadera madhyera yara imana enechila tadera amara diyechilama tadera pratidana, kinta tadera adhikansa'i chila satyatyagi.

Ohe yara imana enecha! Allah‌ke bhayabhakti karo ebam tamra rasulera prati bisbasasthapana karo, tini tamra karuna theke duti ansa tomadera pradana karabena, ara tomadera jan'ya tini ekati aloka sthapana karabena yara madhye tomara patha calate paro, ebam tini tomadera paritrana karate parena. Ara allah paritranakari, aphuranta phaladata

granthadharira hayata na'o janate pare ye tara allah‌ra karunabhandarera madhyera kono kichute'i ksamata rakhe na, ara e'i ye karunabhandara to allah‌ra'i hate rayeche, tini eti pradana karena yake tini iccha karena. Bastuta allah birata karunabhandarera adhikari.

Allah alabat tara katha sunechena ye tara sbami sanbandhe tomara kache anuyoga karache ara allah‌ra nikata phariyada karache, ara allah tomadera dujanera kathopakathana sunechena. Niscaya allah sarbasrota, samyaka drasta.

Tomadera madhyera yara tadera stridera theke'yihara’ kare, -- tara tadera ma naya. Tadera mayera to sudhu yara tadera janmadana kareche tara bai to naya. Ara tara to nihsandeha katha balache eka gar'hita katha o ekati d'aha mithya. Ara nihsandeha allah niscita marjanakari, paritranakari.

Ara yara tadera stridera theke'yihara’ kare, tarapara tara ya baleche ta pratyahara kare, seksetre eke-aparake sparsa karara purbe ekati dasera muktidana. E'itira dbara'i tomadera nirdesa de'oya halo. Ara tomara ya karacha se-sanbandhe allah cira- oyakiphahala.

Kinta ye khomje paya na, tabe eke-aparake sparsa karara purbe parapara du'i masa roya rakha. Kinta ye sakti rakhe na, ta’hale satajana abhabagrastake kha'oyano. E ejan'ya ye tomara yena allah o tamra rasulera prati bisbasa sthapana kara, ara egulo hacche allah‌ra bidhi-nisedha. Ara abisbasidera jan'ya rayeche marmantuda sasti.

Nihsandeha yara allah o tamra rasulera birud'dhacarana kare tadera apadastha kara habe yemana apadastha kara haye chila tadera yara chila edera purbabarti, ara amara suspasta nirdesabali abatarana kare'i diyechi. Ara abisbasidera jan'ya rayeche lanchanadayaka sasti.

Ekadina allah taderake eka'i sange uthiye anabena, takhana tini tadera janiye debena ki tara karechila. Allah era hisaba rekhechena yadi'o tara ta bhule geche. Bastuta allah saba-kichura upare saksi rayechena.

Tumi ki laksya kara ni ye allah janena ya-kichu ache mahakasamandale o ya-kichu rayeche prthibite? Tinajanera kono gopana paramarsa-sabha ne'i yekhane tini tadera caturthajana nana, ara pamcajanera'o ne'i yekhane tini tadera sasthajana nana, ara era ceye kama hoka athaba besi hoka, sarbabasthaya tini tadera sange rayechena yekhane'i tara thakuka na kena. Tarapara tini kiyamatera dine tadera janiye debena ki tara karechila. Nihsandeha allah saba-kichu sanbandhe sarbajnata.

Tumi ki tadera prati laksya kara ni yadera nisedha kara hayechila gopana paramarsa-sabha patate, tarapara tara phire giyechila tate ya karate tadera nisedha kara hayechila? Ara tara sala-paramarsa karache papacarane o satrutaya o rasulera prati birud'dhacaranera jan'ya, ara yakhana tara tomara kache ase takhana tara tomake sambhasana kare emanabhabe yebhabe allah tomake sambhasana karena na. Ara tara nijedera madhye balabali kare -- ''kena allah amadera sasti dena na amara ya bali sejan'ya?’’ Tadera jan'ya jahannama'i yathesta -- tara tate'i prabesa karabe, sutaram kata nikrsta e'i gantabyasthala

ohe yara imana enecha! Yakhana tomara kono gopana paramarsa-sabha pato takhana tomara paramarsa karo na papacarana o satruta o rasulera prati abadhyatara jan'ya, baram tomara paramarsa karo satkarmera o dharmabhirutara jan'ye, ara allah‌ke bhaya-bhakti karo yamra kache tomadera ekatrita kara habe.

Nihsandeha sala-paramarsa kebala sayatanera tarapha theke haye thake, yena se yantrana dite pare tadera yara imana eneche, bastuta tadera kono anista hate pare na allah‌ra anumati byatita. Kaje'i allah‌ra upare'i tabe nirbhara karuka bisbasigana.

Ohe yara imana enecha! Yakhana tomadera bala haya majalisa-guloya jayaga kare da'o, takhana jayaga kare diyo, allah tomadera jan'ya jayaga kare debena. Ara yakhana bala haya uthe damra'o, takhana uthe damriyo, tomadera madhyera yara imana eneche o yadera jnana de'oya hayeche allah tadera stare stare maryadaya unnata karabena. Ara tomara ya karacha se-sanbandhe allah cira-oyakiphahala.

Ohe yara imana enecha! Tomara yakhana rasulera sange byaktigata paramarsa kara takhana tomadera paramarsera age dana-khayarata agabarabe, e'iti tomadera jan'ya sreya o pabitratara. Kinta yadi tomara na pa'o tabe nihsandeha allah paritranakari, aphuranta phaladata.

Ki! Tomara ki tomadera byaktigata paramarsera age dana-khayarata agabarate bhaya karacha? Sutaram yakhana tomara kara na, ara allah tomadera prati pherena, takhana namaya kayema karo o yakata adaya karo, ara allah o tamra rasulera ajnapalana karo. Ara tomara ya karacha se-sanbandhe allah cira-oyakiphahala.

Tumi ki tadera prati laksya kara ni yara emana eka jatira sahita bandhutba pate yadera upare allah rusta hayechena? Tara tomadera dalabhukta naya ara tadera'o antarbhukta naya. Ara tara jene-sune'i mithya halapha kare.
Allah tadera jan'ya tairi karechena bhisana sasti. Bastuta tara ya kare caleche ta kata manda
tara tadera sapathaguloke abarana hisebe grahana kareche, phale tara allah‌ra patha theke phiriye rakhe, sutaram tadera jan'ya rayeche lanchanadayaka sasti.
Allah‌ra mokabilaya tadera dhanadaulata kono prakare'i tadera kono kaje asabe na, ara tadera santanasantati'o na. Era hacche agunera adhibasi. Tara tate'i abasthana karabe.

Se'idina allah tadera saba'ike punarut'thita karabena, takhana tara tamra kache halapha karabe yemana tara tomadera kache halapha karache, ara tara hiseba karache ye tara niscaya ekata kichute rayeche. Tara'i ki sbayam mithyabadi naya
sayatana tadera upare kabu kare pheleche, sejan'ya se tadera allah‌ke smarana kara bhuliye diyeche. Era'i hacche sayatanera dala. Eti ki naya ye sayatanera sangopangara nijera'i to ksatigrasta dala
nihsandeha yara allah‌ra o tamra rasulera birud'dhacarana kare tara'i habe carama lanchitadera madhyekara.
Allah bidhana karechena -- ''abasya ami o amara rasulagana bijayi haba'i.’’ Nihsandeha allah mahabaliyana, mahasatti sali.

Tumi allah‌te o parakale bisbasa kare emana kono jati pabe na yara bandhutba patache tadera sange yara allah o tamra rasulera birud'dhacarana karache. Hoka na kena tara tadera pita-pitamaha athaba tadera santanasantati athaba tadera bha'i-biradara athaba tadera a‌tmiya-sbajana. Era'i -- edera antare tini dharmabisbasa likhe diyechena ebam tadera balabrd'dhi karechena tamra kacha theke prerana diye. Ara tini tadera prabesa karabena jannate yadera nice diye baye caleche jharanaraji, tate tara thakabe cirakala. Allah tadera upare prasanna thakabena, ara tara'o tamra prati prasanna ra'ibe. Era'i hacche allah‌ra dalera. Eti ki naya ye allah‌ra daliyara'i to khoda saphalyaprapta
allah‌ra mahima ghosana karache ya-kichu ache mahakasamandale o ya-kichu ache prthibite, ara tini mahasaktisali, paramajnani.

Tini'i se'ijana yini granthadharidera madhyera yara abisbasa posana karechila tadera bitarita kare diyechilena tadera barighara theke prathamakara samabese. Tomara bhabo ni ye tara beriye yabe, ara tara bhebechila ye tadera durgaguli tadera sanraksana karabe allah‌ra birud'dhe, kinta allah tadera kache ese paumchechilena emana eka dika theke ya tara dharana kare ni, ara tini tadera antare bhaya sancara karechilena, tara tadera barighara binasta karechila tadera nijedera hata diye, ara muminadera hata diye. Ata'eba tomara siksa grahana karo, he caksusman lokera
ara yadi e na hato ye allah tadera jan'ye nirbasanera sid'dhanta karechena tahale tini abasya'i tadera e'i duniyate'i sasti ditena. Ara tadera jan'ya akherate rayeche agunera sasti.
E e'ijan'ya ye tara allah o tamra rasulera birud'dhacarana karechila, ara ye ke'u allah‌ra birud'dhacarana kare, allah tabe niscaya'i pratiphala dane kathora.
Tomara ye-kataka khejura gacha kete phelecha athaba yeguloke tadera sikarera upare khara rekhe diyecha, ta to allah‌ra'i anumatikrame, ara yena tini satyatyagidera lanchita karate parena.

Ara ya-kichu tadera theke allah tamra rasulake pha'o diyechena, yara jan'ya tomara dha'oya kara'o ni kono ghora, ara na kono uta, kinta allah tamra rasulaganake dakhala diye thakena yara upare tini iccha kare thakena. Ara allah saba-kichura upare sarbasaktimana.

Allah tamra rasulake janapadabasira nikata theke ya-kichu pha'o diyechena ta kinta allah‌ra jan'ya, ara rasulera jan'ya, ara nikata- a‌tmiyadera jan'ya, ara etimadera o nihsbadera o pathacaridera jan'ya, yate ta tomadera madhyekara dhanidera madhye'i ghoraghurira bastu na haya. Ara rasula ya-kichu tomadera dena ta tabe grahana karo, ara ya-kichu tini nisedha karena tomara birata thako. Ara allah‌ke bhayabhakti karo, nihsandeha allah pratiphala dane kathora.

Se'isaba daridra muhajiradera jan'ya yadera bera kare de'oya hayechila tadera barighara o tadera bisaya-sampatti theke, yara kamana karachila allah‌ra kacha theke anugraha-pracurya o santasti, ebam sahayya karachila allah‌ke o tamra rasulake. Era'i khoda satyaparayana.

Ara yara tadera purbe'i barighara o dharmabisbasa supratisthita karechila tara bhalabase tadera yara tadera kache hijarata kare eseche, ara tara tadera antare kono prayojana bodha kare na tadera ya de'oya hayeche tara jan'ya, ara tara tadera nijedera ceye'o agradhikara deya yadi'o ba tara sbayam abhabagrasta rayeche. Ara ye ke'u tara antarera krpanata theke mukta rekheche tara'i tahale khoda saphalakama.

Ara yara tadera pare esechila tara bale -- ''amadera prabhu! Amadera paritrana karo ara amadera bha'i-bandhudera yara dharmabisbase amadera agrabarti rayechena, ara amadera antare kono hinsa-bidbesa rekho na tadera prati yara imana enechena; amadera prabhu! Tumi'i niscaya parama snehamaya, aphuranta phaladata.’’

Tumi ki tadera dekha ni yara kapatacarana karache, -- tara granthadharidera madhyera yara abisbasa posana kare tadera temana bha'i- bandhudera bale -- ''tomadera yadi bera kare de'oya haya tahale amara'o niscaya'i tomadera sange beriye yaba, ara tomadera byapare amara karora tabedari kakhano karaba na, ara tomadera sange yadi yud'dha kara haya tahale amara niscaya'i tomadera sahayya karaba’’? Ara allah saksya dicchena ye tara niscaya'i mithyabadi.

Yadi tadera bahiskara kara haya, tara tadera sange berube na, ara yadi tadera sange yud'dha kara haya tahale tara tadera sahayya karabe na, ara yadi'o tara tadera sahayya karate ase tahale'o tara prsthapradarsana karabe, sesaparyanta tadera sahayya kara habe na.
Tomara'i baram tadera antare allah‌ra ca'ite'o adhikatara bhayabaha. E e'ijan'ya ye tara hacche emana eka lokadala yara bud'dhi- bibecana rakhe na.

Tara sanghabad'dha haye tomadera birud'dhe yud'dha karabe na suraksita jana-basatira bhetare athaba de'oyala durgera arala theke byatita. Tadera nijedera madhye tadera sangharsa ati pracanda. Tumi tadera bhabate para aikyabad'dha, kinta tadera antara hacche bicchinna. E e'ijan'ya ye tara hacche emana eka jati yara bud'dhisud'dhi rakhe na.
Era tadera mato yara edera abyabahita purbe abasthana karachila, -- tara tadera krtakarmera kuphala asbadana karechila, ara tadera jan'ya rayeche marmantuda sasti.

Sayatanera samatulya, dekho! Se manusake bale -- ''abisbasa karo’’, tarapara yakhana se abisbasa kare takhana se bale -- ''ami niscaya'i tomara theke samparkacyuta, ami abasya'i bisbajagatera prabhu allah‌ke bhaya kari.’’
Sutaram tadera ubhayera parinama e'i ye ubhaye'i thakabe agune, tara sekhane dirghakala abasthana karabe. Ara e'i hacche an'yayacaridera pratiphala.

Ohe yara imana enecha! Allah‌ke bhaya-bhakti karo, ara pratyeke'i bhebe dekhuka ki se agabaracche agamikalera jan'ya, ara allah‌ke bhayabhakti karo. Nihsandeha tomara ya karacha allah se-sanbandhe purna-oyakiphahala.
Ara tomara tadera mato hayo na yara allah‌ke bhule yaya, phale tini tadera bhuliye diye thakena tadera nijedera sanbandhe. Tara'i sbayam satyatyagi.
Agunera basindara o jannatera basindara ekasamana naya. Jannatera adhibasira'i sbayam saphalakama.

Amara yadi e'i kura'anake kono paharera upare abatirna karatama tahale tumi dekhate pete allah‌ra bhaye ta nu'iye pareche, bhenge curamara haye geche. Ara e'i upama -- amara eti lokedera jan'ya bibrta karachi yena tara cinta kare.
Tini'i se'i allah yini byatita an'ya upasya ne'i, tini adrsyera o drsyera parijnata. Tini parama karunamaya, aphuranta phaladata.

Tini'i se'i allah yini byatita kono upasya ne'i, -- rajadhiraja, mahapabitra, prasantidata, nirapatta-bidhayaka, suraksaka, mahasaktisali, mahamahima, parama gerabannita. Sakala mahima allah‌ra, tara ya aropa kare tara bahu urdhbe.
Tini allah‌, srjanakarta, udbhabanakarta, rupadata, tamra'i hacche sarbangasundara namabali. Mahakasamandale o prthibite yara ache tara tamra'i japatapa kare, ara tini mahasaktisali, paramajnani.

Ohe yara imana enecha! Amara satru o tomadera satruke bandhurupe grahana karo na, tomara ki tadera prati bandhutbera prastaba karabe, athaca satyera ya-kichu tomadera kache eseche tate tara abisbasa kareche, tara rasulake o tomadera bahiskara kare diyeche yehetu tomara tomadera prabhu allah‌te bisbasa kara. Yadi tomara beriye thaka amara pathe sangrama karate o amara prasannata labhera pratyasaya, tabe ki tomara tadera prati gopanabhabe'o bandhutba dekhabe, athaca ami bhala jani ya tomara gopana rekhecha ebam ya tomara prakasa karacha? Ara tomadera madhye ye ke'u eti kare se to tabe sarala patha theke bicyuta hayeche.
Yadi tara tomadera kabu karate pare tahale tara tomadera satru haye pare ebam tomadera prati tadera hata o tadera jihaba tara prasarita kare mandabhabe, ara tara caya ye tomara'o yena abisbasa kara.

Tomadera rakta-samparkiya a‌tmiya-sbajana tomadera kono upakare asabe na ara tomadera santanasantatira'o na -- kiyamatera dine, tini tomadera madhye phayasala karabena. Ara tomara ya karacha se-sanbandhe allah samyaka drasta.

Tomadera jan'ya niscaya'i uttama adarsa rayeche ibrahimera o tamra sange yara chila tadera madhye -- yakhana tara tadera lokadalake balechila -- ''niscaya amara dayasun'ya tomadera theke, ara allah‌ke bada diye tomara yara upasana kara tara theke, amara tomadera pratyakhyana karechi, kaje'i amadera madhye o tomadera madhye satruta o hinsa-bidbesa ciradinera jan'ya suru hayeche yataksana na tomara allah‌te -- tamra ekatbe-- bisbasa na kara.’’ Tabe tamra pitrpurusera prati ibrahimera baktabya chila -- ''ami niscaya tomara jan'ya ksamaprarthana karaba, ara allah‌ra kacha theke tomara jan'ya an'ya kono kichute amara ksamata ne'i.’’''Amadera prabhu! Tomara upare'i amara nirbhara karachi, ara tomara'i kache amara phirachi, ara tomara kache'i to pratyabartana.
Amadera prabhu! Amadera tadera sikara baniyo na yara abisbasa posana kare, ara, amadera prabhu! Amadera paritrana karo, nihsandeha tumi, tumi'i to mahasaktisali, paramajnani.’’

Tomadera pakse niscaya'i tamdera madhye ekati uttama adarsa rayeche tara jan'ya ye allah‌te o sesa dine asa-bharasa rakhe. Ara ye ke'u phire yaya tabe niscaya allah -- tini sbayansamrd'dha, cira-prasansita.
Hate pare ye allah tomadera madhye o yadera sange tomara satruta karacha tadera karo-karora madhye bandhutba ghatiye debena. Kenana allah sarbasaktimana. Ara allah paritranakari, aphuranta phaladata.

Allah tomadera nisedha karachena na ye yara tomadera birud'dhe dharmera karane yud'dha kare ni ebam tomadera barighara theke tomadera tariye deya ni, tadera sange tomara sadaya byabahara karabe ebam tadera prati n'yayaparayana habe. Nihsandeha allah n'yayaparayanadera bhalabasena.

Allah kebala tadera sanbandhe tomadera nisedha karachena yara dharmera karane tomadera birud'dhe yud'dha kareche o tomadera barighara theke tomadera tariye diyeche ebam prsthaposakata kareche tomadera bahiskarera byapare, -- ye tomara tadera sange bandhutba patabe. Ara ye ke'u tadera sange bandhutba patabe tara'i to tabe sbayam an'yayakari.

Ohe yara imana enecha! Yakhana bisbasini narira desatyagi haye tomadera kache ase takhana tadera pariksa kare dekho. Allah bhala janena tadera dharmabisbasa sanbandhe. Tarapara yadi tomara janate para ye tara bisbasini tahale tadera pherata pathiyo na abisbasidera nikate. Era tadera jan'ya baidha naya, ara tara'o edera jan'ya baidha naya. Ara tadera diye da'o ya tara kharaca kareche. Ara tomadera upare kono dosa bartabe na yadi tomara tadera bibaha kara yakhana tadera maharana tomara tadera adaya kara. Ara tomara abisbasinidera bibaha-bandhana dhare rekho na, ara tomara ya kharaca karecha ta pherata ca'ibe, ara tara'o pherata caka ya tara kharaca kareche. E'iti'i allah‌ra bidhana. Tini tomadera madhye subicara kare thakena, kenana allah‌i to sarbajnata, paramajnani.

Ara tomadera stridera madhye theke yadi kichu abisbasidera kache tomadera hatachara haye yaya, tarapara yadi tomadera'o suyoga ase tahale yadera strira cale geche tadera pradana karo tara ya kharaca karechila tara samatulya. Ara allah‌ke bhayabhakti karo yamra prati tomara bisbasi hayecha.

He priya nabi! Yakhana bisbasini narira tomara kache ase tomara nikata anugatyera sapatha ka’re ye tara allah‌ra sange kono kichu sarika karabe na, ara curi karabe na, ara byabhicara karabe na, ara tadera santanadera tara hatya karabe na, ara tara emana kono mithya kalanka ratana karabe na ya tadera hatera o tadera payera madhye tara udbhabana kare, ara satkaje tara tomara abadhyata karabe na, -- temana ksetre tadera anugatya grahana karo ebam allah‌ra kache tadera jan'ya paritrana khumjo. Nihsandeha allah paritranakari, aphuranta phaladata.

Ohe yara imana enecha! Se'i lokadalera sange bandhutba karo na yadera prati allah trud'dha hayechena, -- yara parakala samparke hatasa haye pareche, yemana abisbasira kabarera basindadera sanbandhe hatasa rayeche.
Allah‌ra mahima ghosana karache ya-kichu ache mahakasamandale o ya-kichu ache prthibite, ara tini mahasaktisali, paramajnani.
Ohe yara imana enecha! Kena tomara ta bala ya tomara kara na
allah‌ra kache atyanta ghrnita ye tomara emana saba bala ya tomara kara na.
Nihsandeha allah bhalabasena tadera yara tamra pathe yud'dha kare saribad'dhabhabe, yena tara ekati jamata gamthuni.

Ara smarana karo! Musa tamra sbajatike balechilena, ''he amara lokadala! Kena tomara amake kasta diccha yakhana tomara jene giyecha ye ami niscaya'i tomadera nikata allah‌ra prerita-purusa?’’ Tarapara tara yakhana bimukha haye giyechila takhana allah tadera hrdayake bimukha kare dilena. Ara allah satyatyagi jatike satpathe calana na.

Ara smarana karo! Marimayaputra isa balechilena -- ''he isara'ilera bansadharagana! Ami niscaya'i tomadera nikata allah‌ra rasula, amara samakse ta'orate ya rayeche ami tara samarthanakari, ara susambadadata emana eka rasula sanbandhe yini amara pare asabena, tamra nama'ah‌mada’.’’ Tarapara yakhana tini tadera kache elena spasta pramanabalisaha, tara balale -- ''e to eka spasta jadu!’’
Ara tara ca'ite ke besi an'yayakari ye allah‌ra birud'dhe mithya racana kare, athaca take ahbana kara hacche isalamera dike? Ara allah an'yayacari jatike satpathe calana na.
Ora caya allah‌ra alokake tadera mukha diye nibhiye dite. Kinta allah tamra alokake purnanga karate'i yacchena, yadi'o abisbasira apachanda kare.
Tini'i se'ijana yini tamra rasulake pathiyechena pathanirdesa o satya dharma diye yena tini eke pradhan'ya dite parena dharmera -- tadera sabaka’tira upare, yadi'o bahukhodabadira apachanda kare.
Ohe yara imana enecha! Ami ki tomadera sandhana deba emana eka panyadrabyera ya tomadera ud'dhara karabe marmantuda sasti theke
tomara allah‌te o tamra rasule bisbasa karabe, ara allah‌ra pathe sangrama karabe tomadera sampada o tomadera jibana diye. E'iti'i hacche tomadera jan'ya sreya yadi tomara janate
tini tomadera paritrana karabena tomadera dosatruti theke, ara tomadera prabesa karabena jannate yadera nice diye baye caleche jharanaraji, ara nandana kananera utkrsta grhasamuhe. Eti'i mahasaphalya
ara an'ya ekati ya tomara bhalabasa -- allah‌ra kacha theke sahayya o asanna bijaya. Ara susambada da'o muminadera.

Ohe yara imana enecha! Tomara allah‌ra sahayyakari ha'o, yemana mariyama-putra isa sisyadera balechilena -- ''kara allah‌ra taraphe amara sahayyakari habe?’’ Sisyera balechila, ''amara'i allah‌ra sahayyakari.’’ Sutaram isara'ilera bansadharadera madhyera ekadala bisbasa karechila ebam ekadala abisbasa karechila. Sejan'ya yara imana enechila tadera amara sahayya karechilama tadera satrudera birud'dhe, phale paraksane'i tara uparahata hayechila.
Mahakasamandale ya-kichu ache o ye ke'u ache prthibite tara allah‌ra mahima japatapa kare, -- yini maharajadhiraja, parama pabitra, mahasaktisali, paramajnani.

Tini'i se'ijana yini niraksaradera madhye, tadera'i madhye theke, ekajana rasula damra kariyechena, tini tadera kache patha karachena tamra nirdesabali, ara tini tadera pabitra karechena, ara tini tadera siksa diyechena dharmagrantha o jnanabijnana, yadi'o era age tara to chila spasta bibhrantite
ara tadera madhye theke an'yan'yadera yara ekhana'o tadera sange yoga deya ni. Ara tini mahasaktisali, paramajnani.
E'iti'i allah‌ra anugraha-pracurya, -- eti tini dana karena yake tini iccha karena. Ara allah birata karunabhandarera adhikari.

Yadera ta'oratera bhara de'oya hayechila, tarapara tara ta anusarana kare ni, tadera drstanta hacche gadhara mato, ye grantharajira bojha ba'iche. Kata nikrsta se-jatira drstanta yara allah‌ra nirdesabali pratyakhyana kare. Ara allah an'yayacari jatike satpathe calana na.
Balo -- ''ohe yara ihudi mata posana kara! Yadi tomara mane kara ye lokajanake bada diye tomara'i allah‌ra bandhubandhaba, tahale tomara mrtyu kamana karo, yadi tomara satyabadi ha'o.’’
Kinta tadera nijedera hata ya agabariyeche sejan'ya tara kakhano ta kamana karabe na. Ara allah an'yayacaridera sanbandhe samyaka jnata.

Balo -- ''alabat mrtyu, ya theke tomara palate ca'o, ta kinta tomadera saksat karabe'i, tarapara tomadera pathano habe adrsyera o drsyera parijnatara kache, takhana tini tomadera janiye debena ki tomara karate.’’

Ohe yara imana enecha! Yakhana jumu'ara dine namayera jan'ya ahbana kara haya takhana tomara allah‌ra smarane taratari karabe o beca-kena bandha rakhabe. E'iti'i hacche tomadera jan'ya sreya, yadi tomara janate.

Tarapara yakhana namaya sesa haye yaya takhana tomara dese chariye paro ebam allah‌ra karunabhandara theke anbesana karo, ara allah‌ke pracurabhabe smarana karo, yate tomadera saphalata pradana kara haya.

Kinta yakhana tara panyadrabya athaba krira-kautuka dekhate paya takhana tara sedike bhenge pare ebam tomake damrano abasthaya phele rakhe. Tumi balo -- ''allah‌ra kache ya rayeche ta krira-kautukera ceye o byabasa-banijyera ceye'o uttama! Ara jibikadatadera madhya allah‌i sarbasrestha.’’

Munaphikara yakhana tomara kache ase tara takhana bale -- ''amara saksya dicchi ye tumi'i to niscaya'i allah‌ra rasula.’’ Ara allah janena ye tumi niscaya'i tamra rasula. Bastuta allah saksya dicchena ye munaphikagosthi'i alabat mithyabadi.
Tara tadera sapathaguloke abaranirupe grahana kare, yate tara allah‌ra patha theke phiriye rakhate pare. Nihsandeha tara ya kare caleche ta kata manda
eti e'i jan'ya ye tara imana ane, tarapara abisbasa kare; sejan'ya tadera hrdayera upare mohara mere deya hayeche, pariname tara bujhate-sujhate pare na.

Ara tumi yakhana tadera dekha takhana tadera ga-gatara tomake tajjaba baniye deya, ara yadi tara katha bale tabe tumi tadera buli sone thaka. Tara yena eka-ekati kathera kudom thesa diye rakha. Tara mane kare pratyekati soragola tadera'i birud'dhe. Tara'i hacche satru, phale tadera sanbandhe sabadhana ha'o. Allah tadera dhbansa karuna! Kotha theke tadera phiriye de'oya hacche

ara yakhana tadera bala haya -- ''eso, allah‌ra rasula tomadera jan'ya ksama prarthana karabena’’, tara takhana tadera matha nare, ara tumi dekhate pa'o tara phiriye rakhache. Ara tara garbita bodha karache.

Tumi tadera jan'ya ksama prarthana kara athaba tadera jan'ya ksama prarthana na'i kara -- e tadera jan'ya ekasamana. Allah kakhano tadera ksama karabena na. Niscaya satyatyagi lokadalake allah satpathe calana na.

Ora'i to tara yara bale -- ''allah‌ra rasulera sange yara rayeche tadera jan'ya kharaca karo na ye paryanta na tara sare pare.’’ Ara mahakasamandalera o prthibira dhanabhandara to allah‌ra'i, kinta munaphikagosthi bojhe na.

Tara bale -- ''amara yadi madinaya phire ya'i tahale prabalara durbaladera sekhana theke abasya'i bera kare debe.’’ Kinta ksamata to allah‌ra'i ara tamra rasulera ara muminadera, kinta munaphikara jane na.
Ohe yara imana enecha! Tomadera dhanasampatti o tomadera santanasantati yena tomadera allah‌ra smarana theke phiriye na rakhe. Ara ye temana kare -- tara'i to tabe khoda ksatigrasta habe.

Ara amara tomadera ya jibanopakarana diyechi ta theke tomara kharaca karo tomadera kono ekajanera kache mrtyu ese parara age'i, pache take balate haya -- ''amara prabhu! Kena tumi amake eka asannakala paryanta abakasa da'o ni, tahale to ami dana-khayarata karatama ebam ami satkarmidera antarbhukta hate paratama.’’
Ara allah kono sattbake abakasa dena na yakhana tara antima-samaya ese yaya. Ara tomara ya kara se-sanbandhe allah purna'oyakiphahala.
Allah‌ra'i japatapa karache ya-kichu ache mahakasamandale o ya-kichu ache prthibite, tamra'i hacche sarbabhaumatba o tamra'i sakala prasansa, ara tini saba-kichura upare sarbasaktimana.
Tini'i se'ijana yini tomadera srsti karechena, tarapara tomadera ke'u-ke'u abisbasi o tomadera ke'u-ke'u bisbasi. Ara tomara ya kara allah tara samyaka drasta.
Tini mahakasamandala o prthibike srsti karechena yathayathabhabe, ara tini tomadera akrti diyechena, tarapara tomadera akrtike kata sundara karechena! Ara tamra'i kache sesa-pratyabartana.
Mahakasamandalite o prthibite ya-kichu ache ta tini janena, ara tini janena ya tomara luko'o o ya tomara prakasa kara. Ara antarera bhetare ya ache se-sanbandhe'o tini sarbajnata.
Tomadera kache ki tadera sambada pecheni yamra itipurbe abisbasa posana karechila, tarapara tadera kajera sasti asbadana karechila? Ara tadera jan'ya rayeche marmantuda sasti.

Eti e'ijan'ya ye tadera kache tadera rasulagana asatechilena suspasta pramanabali niye, kinta tara balata -- ''manusa'i bujhi amadera patha dekhabe?’’ Sutaram tara abisbasa karala o phire gela, athaca allah beparoya rayechena. Ara allah sbayansamrd'dha prasansar'ha.

Yara abisbasa posana kare tara dhare niyeche ye tadera kakhano tola habe na. Balo -- ''ham, amara prabhura kasama, ati-abasya tomadera tola habe, tarapara tomadera abasya'i janano habe ya tomara karechile.’’ Ara e'iti allah‌ra pakse sahaja.
Ata'eba tomara allah‌te bisbasa karo, ara tamra rasule o se'i aloke ya amara abatarana karechi. Ara tomara ya karacha se-samparke allah purna-oyakiphahala.

Se'idina tini tomadera samabeta karabena jamayet karara dinera jan'ye -- e'iti'i moha-apasaranera dina. Ara ye ke'u allah‌te bisbasa kare ebam satkarma sampadana kare, tini tara theke tara saba papa mocana kare debena ebam take prabesa karabena sbargo'udyanasamuhe yadera nice diye baye caleche jharanaraji, sekhane tara abasthana karabe cirakala. E'iti eka birata saphalya.
Ara yara abisbasa posana kare ebam amadera nirdesabali pratyakhyana kare, tara'i hacche agunera basinda -- tara sekhane'i abasthana karabe. Ara kata manda se'i gantabyasthana
kono bipada apatita haya na allah‌ra anumati byatita. Ara ye ke'u allah‌te bisbasa kare tini tara hrdayake supathe calita karena. Ara allah saba-kichu sanbandhe sarbajnata.
Ara allah‌ra ajnapalana karo o rasulake mene calo; kinta yadi tomara phire ya'o tahale amadera rasulera upare kebala suspastabhabe paumche de'oya.
Allah -- tini byatita an'ya upasya ne'i. Sutaram allah‌ra upare'i tabe muminara nirbhara karuka.

Ohe yara imana enecha! Niscaya tomadera kono-kono strira o tomadera chelemeyera tomadera satru, ata'era tadera ksetre husiyamra ha'o. Kinta yadi tomara mapha kare da'o o upeksa kara o ud'dhara kara, tahale allah paritranakari, aphuranta phaladata.
Nihsandeha tomadera dhanadaulata o tomadera santanasantati to eka pariksa. Ara allah‌, tamra'i kache rayeche birata pratidana.

Ata'eba allah‌ke bhayabhakti karo yatata tomara saksama ha'o, ara sono, ara ajnapalana karo, ara byaya karo, -- e tomadera nijedera jan'ya kalyanamaya. Ara ye ke'u tara antarera lobha-lalasa theke sanyata rakhe tara'i tabe khoda saphalakama haya.
Yadi tomara allah‌ke karja da'o eka uttama karja, tini seti tomadera jan'ya bahu-gunita kare debena, ara tini tomadera paritrana karabena. Ara allah gunagrahi, ati amayika.
Tini adrsya o drsyera parijnata, mahasaktisali, paramajnani.

He priya nabi! Yakhana tomara strilokadera talaka da'o takhana tadera talaka diyo tadera nirdharita dinera jan'ya, ara iddatera hisaba rekho, ara tomadera prabhu allah‌ke bhaya-bhakti karo. Tomara tadera bera kare di'o na tadera thaka-ghara theke, ebam tara'o yena beriye na yaya yadi na tara spasta aslilataya lipta haye thake. Ara egulo'i allah‌ra sima. Ara ye ke'u allah‌ra bidhana langhana kare se to tabe nijera antara‌tmara prati an'yaya kare'i pheleche. Tumi jano na, hayata allah era pare kono upaya kare debena.

Tarapara yakhana tara tadera iddatakale paumche yaya takhana haya tadera rekhe debe bhalabhabe athaba tadera charachari kare debe bhalabhabe, ara tomadera madhye theke du'ijana n'yayaparayana lokake saksi karo, ara tomara allah‌ra uddesye saksya kayema karabe. E'ibhabe'i era dbara take upadesa de'oya hacche ye allah‌te o akheratera dine bisbasa kare. Ara ye ke'u allah‌ke bhaya-bhakti kare tara jan'ya tini berubara patha kare dena.

Ara tini take jibanopakarana pradana karena emana dika theke ya se dharana'o kare ni. Ara ye allah‌ra upare nirbhara kare -- tara jan'ya tabe tini'i yathesta. Nihsandeha allah tamra uddesya paripurnakari. Allah niscaya'i saba-kichura jan'ya eka parimapa dharya kare rekhechena.

Ara tomadera naridera yara rtu sanbandhe hatasbasa hayeche, yadi tomara sandeha kara tahale tadera iddata habe tina masa, ara tadera'o yara rtumati haya ni. Ara garbhabati narira -- tadera samayasima hacche ye tara yena tadera garbha namiye phele. Ara ye ke'u allah‌ke bhaya-bhakti kare, tini tara kajakarma tara jan'ya sahaja kare debena.
E'iti'i allah‌ra bidhana -- tomadera kache tini e abatarana karechena. Ara ye ke'u allah‌ke bhaya-bhakti kare tara theke tini tara papasamuha mocana karabena, ara tara jan'ya pratidana bariye debena.

Tadera basa karate da'o yekhane tomara basa karacha, tomadera samarthya anuyayi, ara tadera kasta diyo na tadera abastha sankatamaya kare tolara jan'ye. Ara yadi tara garbhabati haye thake tabe tadera jan'ya kharaca karo ye paryanta na tara tadera garbhabhara namiye phele, tarapara yadi tara tomadera jan'ya stan'yadana kare tahale tadera majuri tadera pradana karabe, ara tomadera madhye bhalobhabe kaja karate balo, ara yadi tomara amata ha'o tabe tara jan'ya an'yajane stan'ya dika.

Pracuryera adhikari yena tara pracurya theke kharaca kare, ara yara upare tara jibika simita kara hayeche se yena kharaca kare allah take ya diyechena ta theke. Allah kono sattbake kasta dena na tini take ya diyechena tara atirikta. Allah acire'i kastera pare arama pradana karabena.
Ara kata na janapada tara prabhura o tamra rasuladera nirdesera birud'dhe damriyechila, phale amara tara hisaba talaba karechilama kara hisaba talabe, ara amara take sasti diyechilama sakta sastite.
Sejan'ya ta tara kajera mandaphala asbadana karechila, ara tara kajera parinama ksatikara hayechila.
Allah tadera jan'ya bhisana sasti tairi rekhechena, ata'eba allah‌ke bhaya-bhakti karo, he jnanabana lokera -- yara imana enecha! Allah tomadera kache prerana kare'i rekhechena eka smaraka

ekajana rasula -- tini tomadera kache abrtti karachena allah‌ra nirdesabali, suspastabhabe, yena yara imana eneche o satkaja karache tadera tini bera kare anate parena andhakara theke aloke. Ara ye ke'u allah‌te imana ane o satkaja kare, take tini prabesa karabena sbargo'udyanasamuhe yadera nice diye baye caleche jharanaraji, sekhane se abasthana karabe cirakala. Allah tara jan'ya jibanopakaranake ati utkrsta kare'i rekhechena.

Allah‌i tini yini srsti karechena sata asamana, ara prthibira belaya'o tadera anurupa. Bidhana abatarana kare caleche tadera madhye, yena tomara janate para ye allah saba-kichura upare sarbasaktimana, ara e'i ye allah saba-kichuke ghire rekhechena jnanera dbara.
He priya nabi! Kena tumi ta nisid'dha karacha ya allah tomara jan'ya baidha karachena? Tumi ca'icha tomara stridera khusi karate? Ara allah paritranakari, aphuranta phaladata.
Allah tomadera jan'ya bidhana diye rekhechena tomadera sapathagulo theke muktira upaya; ara allah tomadera raksakari bandhu, ara tini'i sarbajnata, paramajnani.

Ara smarana karo! Nabi tamra stridera kono ekajanera kache gopane ekati sambada diyechilena; -- kinta tini yakhana ta bale dilena, ebam allah tamra kache eti janiye diyechilena, takhana tini tamke tara katakata janiyechilena ebam cepe giyechilena an'ya katakata. Tini yakhana tamke ta janiyechilena takhana tini balalena -- ''ke apanake e katha balale?’’ Tini balechilena -- ''amake sambada diyechena se'i sarbajnata, cira-oyakiphahala.’’

Yadi tomara ubhaye allah‌ra dike phero, kenana tomadera hrdaya itipurbe'i jhomke geche. Kinta yadi tomara dujane tamra birud'dhe prsthaposakata kara tahale allah -- tini'i tamra raksakari bandhu, ara jibrila o punyabana muminagana, ara uparanta phiris‌tara'o prsthaposaka.

Hate pare tamra prabhu, yadi tini tomadera talaka diye dena, tabe tini tamke badale debena tomadera ca'ite'o utkrsta stridera -- a‌tmasamarpita, bisbasini, binayabanata, anutapakarini, upasanakarini, royapalanakarini, sbamigharakarini o kumari.

Ohe yara imana enecha! Tomadera nijedera o tomadera paribara-parijanadera raksa karo se'i aguna theke yara jbalani hacche manusa o patharagulo, tara upare rayeche phiris‌tara -- anamaniya, kathora, tara allah‌ke aman'ya kare na ya tini tadera adesa kare thakena, ara tara ta'i kare ya tadera adesa kara haya.
Ohe yara abisbasa posana karecha! Ajakera dine kono ajuhata eno na. Nihsandeha tomadera to pratiphala de'oya hacche ya tomara kare thakate tara'i.

Ohe yara imana enecha! Allah‌ra dike phero bisud'dha pheraya, hate pare tomadera prabhu tomadera theke tomadera papa mocana kare debena ebam tomadera prabesa karabena jannate yadera nice diye baye caleche jharanaraji; se'i dina allah apadastha karabena na nabike ebam yara tamra sange imana eneche tadera, tadera rosani tadera samane calabe ara tadera danapase, tara balabe -- ''amadera prabhu! Amadera jan'ya amadera rosani paripurna karo, ara amadera paritrana karo. Nihsandeha tumi saba-kichura upare sarbasaktimana.’’
He priya nabi! Jihada karo abisbasidera o munaphikadera sange, ara tadera prati kathora ha'o. Ara tadera abasasthala hacche jahannama, ara manda se'i gantabyasthana

Allah ekati drstanta upasthapita karachena tadera jan'ya yara abisbasa posana kare, -- nuhera strira o lutera strira. Tara ubhaye chila amadera bandadera madhyera du'ijana satkarmaparayana bandara adhine, kinta tara tamdera prati bisbasaghatakata karechila, phale tamra allah‌ra birud'dhe tadera kono kaje asena ni; ara bala habe -- ''tomara dujane'o prabesakaridera sange agune prabesa karo.’’

Ara allah ekati drstanta upasthapita karachena tadera jan'ya yara imana eneche, -- phira'a'unera strira. Smarana karo! Se balechila -- ''amara prabhu! Amara jan'ya behesate tomara sannikate ekati abasa tairi karo, ara amake ud'dhara karo phira'a'una o tara kriyakalapa theke, ara amake ud'dhara karo an'yayacari lokadera theke.’’

Ara imaranera kan'ya mariyama, ye tara angika kartabyabali raksa karechila, phale amara tara madhye amadera ruha theke phumke diyechilama, ara se tara prabhura banike o tamra granthaguloke satya jenechila, ara se chila binayabanatadera madhyekara.
Mahamahimanbita tini yamra hate rayeche sarbabhauma kartrtba, ara tini saba-kichura upare sarbasaktimana
yini mrtyu o jibana srsti karechena tomadera yaca'i karate ye tomadera madhye ke kajakarme srestha. Ara tini mahasaktisali, paritranakari
yini sata akasa srsti karechena subin'yastabhabe. Tumi parama karunamayera srstite kono asamanjasya dekhate pabe na. Tarapara tumi drsti ghuriye-phiriye na'o, tumi ki kono phatala dekhate paccha
tarapara drsti arekabara ghuriye-phiriye na'o, drsti tomara kache phire asabe byartha haye, ara ta habe klanta.

Ara amara nikatabarti akasake susobhita kare rekhechi pradipamala diye, ara amara tadera baniyechi sayatanadera jan'ya bhamotara bisaya; ara amara tadera jan'ya prastuta rekhechi jbalanta agunera sasti.
Ara yara tadera prabhuke abisbasa kare tadera jan'ya rayeche jahannamera sasti. Ara manda se'i gantabyasthana
yakhana tadera sekhane niksepa kara habe takhana tara tara theke bikata garjana sunate pabe, ara ta lelihana sikha charabe
yena krodhe phete parache. Yakhana'i kono ekadalake ote niksepa kara habe tara raksira tadera jijnasa karabe -- ''tomadera kache ki kono satarkakari asena ni?”

Tara balabe -- ''ham, amadera kache satarkakari itipurbe ese gechena, amara kintu asbikara karechilama o balechilama -- 'allah kono-kichu abatarana karena ni, tomara rayecha birata pathabhrantite bai to na'o’.’’
Ara tara balabe -- ''amara yadi sunatama athaba bud'dhi prayoga karatama tahale amara jbalanta agunera basindadera madhye hatama na.’’
Sutaram tara tadera aparadha sbikara karabe, phale jbalanta agunera basindadera jan'ya -- 'dura ha!’
Nihsandeha yara tadera prabhuke bhaya kare gopane tadera jan'ya rayeche paritrana o birata pratidana.
Athaca tomadera kathabarta tomara gopana kara athaba ta prakasa'i kara. Nihsandeha tini bukera bhetarera bisaya sanbandhe'o sarbajnata.
Yini srsti karechena tini ki janena na? Ara tini gupta bisaye jnata, purna-oyakiphahala.
Tini'i se'ijana yini prthibitake tomadera jan'ya kare diyechena santa, phale tomara era digadigante bicarana karacha ebam tara jibika theke ahara karacha. Ara tamra'i kache punarut'thana.
Ki! Yini urdhbaloke rayechena tamra kacha theke ki tomara nirapatta grahana karecha ye tini prthibike diye tomadera grasa karabena na, yakhana alabat ta andolita habe

Athaba yini urdhbaloke rayechena tamra kacha theke ki tomara nirapatta grahana karecha pache tini tomadera upare pathiye dena eka kankaramaya ghurnijhara? Phale tomara sighra'i janate parabe kemana chila amara satarkabani
ara edera age yara chila tara'o pratyakhyana karechila, takhana kemana hayechila amara asantosa
tara ki dekhe ni tadera upare pakhidera charano o gutano? Tadera parama karunamaya chara ke'u dhare rakhena na. Nihsandeha tini'i sarbabisaye samyaka drasta.
Accha, parama karunamayake bada diye ke se'iti -- ye habe tomadera jan'ya senabahini ye tomadera sahayya karabe? Abisbasira to bibhrantite thaka chara ara kotha'o naya.
Athaba ke se ye tomadera jibika debe yadi tini tamra riyeka bandha kare dena? Bastuta tara abadhyataya o bitrsnaya anara rayeche.
Accha, ye tara mukhera upare thubare thubare cale se ki tabe besi satpathe calita, na se'ijana ye soja haye cale sud'dha-sathika pathe
balo -- ''tini'i se'ijana yini tomadera bikasita karechena, ara tomadera jan'ya baniye diyechena srabanasakti o drstisakti o antahkarana. Tomara ya krtajnata prakasa kara se to yatsaman'ya!’’
Tumi bale ya'o -- ''tini'i se'ijana yini prthibite tomadera chariye diyechena, ara tamra'i kache tomadera ekatrita kara habe.’’
Ara tara bale -- ''kakhana e'i oyada habe? Yadi tomara satyabadi ha'o.’’
Tumi balo -- ''jnana kebala allah‌ra'i kache ache, ara ami nihsandeha ekajana spasta satarkakari matra.’’
